Author: cryptoriya.io
Title: ⚡[ANN]⚡CryptoRiya 💰 Crypto to Cash Anywhere Without any Bank 🗼Exchange Live 🗼
Body: Dear Bitcointalk Members, We extend our sincerest apologies to all members of bitcointalk for the bad experience you had with us last year. Our bounty manager made an unprofessional move by labeling our company “a scam”. You all decided to support us out of your free will, and never have we ever had plans of defrauding you all. Our goal at Cryptoriya is to make it easy for you to be able to exchange your digital assets conveniently at any given time. The bounty manager was just employed temporarily to manage our bounty program as at that time, and we have fully dissociated ourselves from him. We’d love to earn your trust and support back again. And we are pleased to let you all know that we have launched our exchange program, and would love to have every one of you support us by making use of our exchange https://www.ciya.io. We hope you all can give us a second chance. Warm regards, CEO

Author: junior002
Title: ⚡[ANN]⚡CryptoRiya 💰 Crypto to Cash Anywhere Without any Bank 🗼Exchange Live 🗼
Body: Here are the easy steps to convert crypto to cash using Cryptoriya 1. Visit the App or cryptoriya website and select the currency you wish to exchange. 2. Location Selection. Select the country and city where you want to receive the cash. 3. Enter the amounts. Cryptoriya will automatically check the available cash limits of the agent in the city you selected. Enter any amount between the minimum and maximum limits. 4. Send the cryptocurrency. Send the deposit amount to the displayed address and wait for confirmation on the blockchain network. Once confirmed notification will be sent via sms and email. 5. Visit our nearby location. Users visit the nearest agent/cash point location and provide the transaction number and 8 digit pin. The agent will check the details and request for OTP. 6. Receive the cash. Once the verification is completed, the agent will give the cash to the user and transaction is completed.  It is easy to follow and to understand the process of converting crypto to cash using cryptoriya.

User first select crypto-currency which you have to exchange for cash. 3. Select which cryptocurrency you want to exchange. 4. Send your cryptocurrency to the displayed address. 5. Eight-digit code has generated in website or mobile application. 6. By having reference eight-digit code and order no, you can locate the agent which is available worldwide. 7. Then you have to meet with an agent and show them your order number and reference number. 8. The agent checked the order details in the system and generated otp will come to your mobile no and email. 9. Than you have to share the otp with your agent. By doing all the procedure, the agent can give you cash amount that you are demanding.  This is quoted from the white paper. Author: flash12i
Title: ⚡[ANN]⚡CryptoRiya 💰 Crypto to Cash Anywhere Without any Bank 🗼Exchange Live 🗼
Body: Quite a good point there beeelzebub!  The planned USD 6,500 Daily Withdrawal Limit is indeed way beyond the average daily withdrawal limit of US banks alone.  Take for instance Bank of America where the daily ATM withdrawal limit is USD 1,500 only. That's USD 5,000 less of  CryptoRiya's limit. Although Bank of America, apart from the daily ATM withdrawal, has a provision for debit purchases set at USD 5,000 daily.  Perhaps the two combined is the basis of CryptoRiya's daily withdrawal limit given that CryptoRiya offers this through their regular Debit Cards.  Still, it would be nice to hear from CryptoRiya themselves how they could facilitate the USD 6,500 daily ATM withdrawal.

Body: Hi there Voltesbit!  Quite an interesting question  really. So sense and reason led me to believe that CryptoRiya's services will be available where countries consider Bitcoin to be legally allowed.  Right now, cryptocurrency is still pretty much undefined for most countries and how it is being treated varies substantially from government to government.  Yet, we can expect CryptoRiya to exist in countries where bitcoin is accepted legally (as other cryptocurrency is treated the same, usually), here's a link that might shed light on your question:  https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Legality_of_bitcoin_by_country_or_territory

With the above given, CryptoRiya is well in check of the possibilities of money laundering and placed enough limit and security to ensure customers and users are well regulated and compliant with governing financial laws.

Author: cryptoriya.io
Title: ⚡[ANN]⚡CryptoRiya 💰 Crypto to Cash Anywhere Without any Bank 🗼Exchange Live 🗼
Body: Dear Bitcointalk Members, We extend our sincerest apologies to all members of bitcointalk for the bad experience you had with us last year. Our bounty manager made an unprofessional move by labeling our company “a scam”. You all decided to support us out of your free will, and never have we ever had plans of defrauding you all. Our goal at Cryptoriya is to make it easy for you to be able to exchange your digital assets conveniently at any given time. The bounty manager was just employed temporarily to manage our bounty program as at that time, and we have fully dissociated ourselves from him. We’d love to earn your trust and support back again. And we are pleased to let you all know that we have launched our exchange program, and would love to have every one of you support us by making use of our exchange https://www.ciya.io. We hope you all can give us a second chance. Warm regards, CEO
